unnormalised: ## Chai Pe Charcha: Bollywood Buzz & Beyond!
normalised: ## Chai Upon Discussion: Bollywood Buzz And Beyond!

unnormalised: Okay, guys, grab your chai and samosas because we've got some sizzling celebrity gossip to dish out! Bollywood's been buzzing like a beehive after a Diwali mithai raid.
normalised: Okay, guys, grab your chai and samosas because we have some sizzling celebrity gossip to dish out! Bollywood has been buzzing like a beehive after a Diwali mithai raid.

unnormalised: First up, rumours are flying faster than a Rajdhani Express about Ranbir Kapoor and Alia Bhatt. Apparently, sources close to the Kapoor khandaan are saying baby Raha might be getting a sibling soon! Think it’s just PR leading up to a movie release, or is there some real ghee simmering in that relationship? You decide!
normalised: First up, rumors are flying faster than a Rajdhani Express about Ranbir Kapoor and Alia Bhatt. Apparently, sources close to the Kapoor family are saying baby Raha might be getting a sibling soon! Think it is just P R leading up to a movie release, or is there some real ghee simmering in that relationship? You decide!

unnormalised: Then, there's the whole Priyanka Chopra and Nick Jonas saga. Spotted vacationing in Goa last week, looking all loved up, but whispers are suggesting a possible tiff over Nick's new music video featuring… *gasp*… another actress! Drama, drama, drama! Is it just me, or is Goa the new Maldives for celebrity relationship crises?
normalised: Then, there is the whole Priyanka Chopra and Nick Jonas saga. Spotted vacationing in Goa last week, looking all loved up, but whispers are suggesting a possible tiff over Nick's new music video featuring… gasp… another actress! Drama, drama, drama! Is it just me, or is Goa the new Maldives for celebrity relationship crises?

unnormalised: And can we talk about Deepika Padukone's airport look? Seriously, who wears a full-on silk saree to fly economy? Talk about keeping it real (or not!). The whole internet is going wild. Some are calling her grounded, others are saying it's pure showbaazi. Personally, I think she just really, really loves a good Kanjeevaram.

Some are calling her grounded, others are saying it is pure showbaazi. Personally, I think she just really, really loves a good Kanjeevaram.

unnormalised: Speaking of food, word on the street is that Katrina Kaif threw a huge Onam Sadhya party for Vicky Kaushal’s family. Guess she’s trying to impress the in-laws with some authentic Malayali cooking. Smart move, Kat! Nothing says “I’m family” like a steaming plate of avial and payasam.
normalised: Speaking of food, word on the street is that Katrina Kaif threw a huge Onam Sadhya party for Vicky Kaushal’s family. Guess she is trying to impress the in-laws with some authentic Malayali cooking. Smart move, Kat! Nothing says “I am family” like a steaming plate of avial and payasam.

unnormalised: Finally, Karan Johar's Koffee with Karan season 8 is reportedly being filmed, with rumours suggesting that Shah Rukh Khan and Salman Khan are going to be together on one episode! Can you imagine the masala? The TRPs are going to be through the roof! My prediction: awkward silences and subtle digs, seasoned with Karan's signature brand of rapid-fire questions. Stay tuned, folks! This Bollywood bonanza is just getting started! We are waiting for more gossip coming from Film City at 67 km/hr, to deliver more news to you, hot and fresh.
